Hindrances -- Female Novice Adventurer
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d4-1 Strength: d8 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes:
Night Terrors+: -1 Spirit
Ailin'+: -2 vs. Fatigue; critical failure inflicts death
Ailin': -1 vs. Fatigue; critical failure inflicts Ailin'+
Heavy Sleeper: -4 Vigor (stay awake)
Old Ways Oath: May reroll Spirit
Skills (14 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Healing: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d4
Athletics: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4

Faith: (spi) d4 Performance: (spi) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Gambling: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Trade: (sma) d4
Skill Notes: Heavy Sleeper: -4 Notice (wake up)
Size: 0 Deity: None
Advances: 0 Improvement Points: 4 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (1 points): Quick Hindrances: Ailin'+; Ailin'; Cursed+; Grim Servant O' Death+; Heavy Sleeper; Lyin' Eyes; Night Terrors+; Old Ways Oath; Talisman+; Talisman; Tenderfoot+; Trouble Magnet+; Trouble Magnet Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Cursed+: GM gains +1 Benny each session
Night Terrors+: Makes noise while sleeping that keeps others awake
Old Ways Oath: Has vowed not to use ghost rock-powered items
Tenderfoot+: Suffers additional -1 penalty when wounded
Trouble Magnet+: Always suffers random consequences
Trouble Magnet: Suffers increased consequences from critical failures
Combat

Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Grim Servant O'Death+: +1 damage; critical failure hits nearest ally w/Raise
Lyin'Eyes: -1 Gambling (poker and faro)/-1 Intimidation (lies)/-1 Persuasion (lies)
Quick: Discard and redraw Action Cards lower than 6
Arcana
Arcana Notes:
Talisman+: -2 casting when talisman absent
Talisman: -1 casting when talisman absent
